article.title: Booz Allen Wins Contract for Engineering and Integration Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton and the U.S. Air Force are modifying a cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for $10 million. This action will provide for systems engineering and integration support to the Military Satellite Communications Wing, Space and Missile Systems Center, in support of the Global Broadcast Services Program and the Joint Terminal Engineering Office.
